app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: The following are available online at https://www.mdpi.com/2304-8158/10/1/61/s1; Supplementary Material S1. Studied areas and research works analysed in the present paper. Supplementary Material S2: Information not coming from the database analysed, but from complementary informants. Supplementary Material S3: Wild food plants and their uses in the Catalan linguistic area (simplified data). Supplementary Material S4: Wild food plants and their uses in the Catalan linguistic area (complete database).
